Welcome to Hunan Restaurant

The best Chinese food in Mt Pleasant, SC
Order Pickup shopping-basket-smile-1 Order Delivery delivery-truck-3 Check Our Popular Dishes 
Gallery
Where We Started 
Our Story

Hunan Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese cuisine in Mt Pleasant, SC. Hunan's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for dine-in or take-out meals in the Mt Pleasant community. Our restaurant is known for its variety in taste and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

Bottled Soda $2.25 View Full Menu tools-kitchen-serving-dome What our customers say 
Reviews

It’s not easy trying to find good Chinese food in South Carolina. I wanted to find somewhere authentic and this place is IT. If anyone is looking for authenticity this is the place!
Winnie Zhao 
The best Chinese food in town. I've lived in Mount Pleasant for over 20 years and just recently discovered Hunan Chinese Restaurant. Everything we ordered was delicious.
Gessie James 
The food is always fresh and the Asian staff are always kind and professional. I'm a lifelong East Cooper resident and have tried everywhere. This is the most reliable by far!
Robert Whyy 
I tried them out tonight. Can't believe how inexpensive/reasonable their prices were so I gave them a try. Food was piping hot when I picked it up. Very good flavors. My kind of place!
Bryan Corbett 
Hands down, my favorite Chinese place in the great state of South Carolina. Everything is very fresh and the value is great. This food will 100% make your day. Highly recommend!
Aly Collum 
Love this place! The food is consistently good and always fresh! I usually get vegetable fried rice or sweet and sour chicken and both are always delish! Give them a try!
Paige McKenna

Reviews

It’s not easy trying to find good Chinese food in South Carolina. I wanted to find somewhere authentic and this place is IT. If anyone is looking for authenticity this is the place!
Winnie Zhao 
The best Chinese food in town. I've lived in Mount Pleasant for over 20 years and just recently discovered Hunan Chinese Restaurant. Everything we ordered was delicious.
Gessie James 
The food is always fresh and the Asian staff are always kind and professional. I'm a lifelong East Cooper resident and have tried everywhere. This is the most reliable by far!
Robert Whyy 
I tried them out tonight. Can't believe how inexpensive/reasonable their prices were so I gave them a try. Food was piping hot when I picked it up. Very good flavors. My kind of place!
Bryan Corbett 
Hands down, my favorite Chinese place in the great state of South Carolina. Everything is very fresh and the value is great. This food will 100% make your day. Highly recommend!
Aly Collum 
Love this place! The food is consistently good and always fresh! I usually get vegetable fried rice or sweet and sour chicken and both are always delish! Give them a try!
